slides.title: Wildlife Viewing
slides.subtitle: Enjoy a unique opportunity to observe wildlife in its natural habitat and see various species up close.

slides.title: Safari Tours
slides.subtitle: Experience the thrill of a Safari tour across vast landscapes with opportunities to spot exotic wildlife.

slides.title: Horse & Camel Riding
slides.subtitle: Explore the desert landscape on horseback or camelback for a peaceful way to experience the beauty of the reserve.
